verses.text: And it came to pass, when all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* which \add were\add* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, in the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, and in the \w valleys|strong="H8219"\w*, and in all the \w coasts|strong="H2348"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w Perizzite|strong="H6522"\w*, the \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add thereof;\add*

That they \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* themselves \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* and with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w accord|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 9.2 \ft accord: Heb. mouth\f*

¶ And when the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* what \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* and to \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*,

They did \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w wilily|strong="H6195"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and made as if they had been \w ambassadors|strong="H6737"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w old|strong="H1087"\w* \w sacks|strong="H8242"\w* upon their \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w bottles|strong="H4997"\w*, \w old|strong="H1087"\w*, and \w rent|strong="H1234"\w*, and bound \w up|strong="H6887"\w*;

And \w old|strong="H1087"\w* \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* and \w clouted|strong="H2921"\w* upon their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w old|strong="H1087"\w* \w garments|strong="H8008"\w* upon them; and all the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of their \w provision|strong="H6718"\w* was \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \add and\add* \w mouldy|strong="H5350"\w*.

And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* unto the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* at \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, and to the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, We be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: now therefore \w make|strong="H3772"\w* ye a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with us.

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w Peradventure|strong="H0194"\w* ye \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us; and how shall we \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with you?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, We \add are\add* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Who \add are\add* ye? and from \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* ye?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, From a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* because of the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w fame|strong="H8089"\w* of him, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

And all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, that \add were\add* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, to \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and to \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, which \add was\add* at \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*.

Wherefore our \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of our \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to us, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w victuals|strong="H6720"\w* with \w you|strong="H3027"\w* for the \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* them, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, We \add are\add* your \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: therefore now \w make|strong="H3772"\w* ye a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with us.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft with you: Heb. in your hand\f*

This our \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* we took \w hot|strong="H2525"\w* \add for\add* our \w provision|strong="H6679"\w* out of our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* we came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* unto you; but now, behold, it is \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*, and it is \w mouldy|strong="H5350"\w*:

And these \w bottles|strong="H4997"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, which we \w filled|strong="H4390"\w*, \add were\add* \w new|strong="H2319"\w*; and, behold, they be \w rent|strong="H1234"\w*: and these our \w garments|strong="H8008"\w* and our \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* are become \w old|strong="H1086"\w* by reason of the \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w long|strong="H7230"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* of their \w victuals|strong="H6718"\w*, and \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* not \add counsel\add* at the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 9.14 \ft the men…: or, they received the men by reason of their victuals\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* with them, and \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with them, to let them \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: and the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them.

¶ And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* they had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with them, that they \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that they \add were\add* their \w neighbours|strong="H7138"\w*, and \add that\add* they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. Now their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add were\add* \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, and \w Chephirah|strong="H3716"\w*, and \w Beeroth|strong="H0881"\w*, and \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them not, because the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* had \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto them by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*.

But all the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, We have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto them by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: now therefore we \w may|strong="H3201"\w* not \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* them.

This we will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to them; we will even let them \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, lest \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* be upon us, because of the \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* which we \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them.

And the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Let them \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; but let them be \w hewers|strong="H2404"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w drawers|strong="H7579"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*; as the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* had \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* them.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for them, and he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore have ye \w beguiled|strong="H7411"\w* us, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We \add are\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from you; when ye \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us?

Now therefore ye \add are\add* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w*, and there shall none of you be \w freed|strong="H3772"\w* from being \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w hewers|strong="H2404"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w drawers|strong="H7579"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 9.23 \ft none…: Heb. not be cut off from you\f*

And they \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because it was \w certainly|strong="H5046"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, how that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, therefore we were \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of our \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of you, and have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

And now, behold, \w we|strong="H2009"\w* \add are\add* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: as it \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w right|strong="H3477"\w* unto thee to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto us, \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

And so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he unto them, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them not.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* them that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w hewers|strong="H2404"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w drawers|strong="H7579"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, and for the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which he should \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*.\f + \fr 9.27 \ft made: Heb. gave, or, delivered to be\f*
